title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 199.4 - Access to eligible tracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 199.4 - Access to eligible tracts

State Regulations

The department, including its employees, agents, and
representatives, and the assessor shall have the right at all reasonable times
after proper notification of the owner and proper identification to the owner
as department employees, agents or representatives or the assessor, to enter
and inspect any eligible tract or any tract subject to application for the
purpose of ascertaining compliance with section
480-a
of the Real Property Tax Law or this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
199.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
